AscMod:CursedBank.NAME: Cursed Bank
DESCRIPTIONS: This hungry bank eats some of the gold you pick up.

AscMod:CursedFlame.NAME: Cursed Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: The eternal flame of the spire punishes you when you kill a boss.

AscMod:MegaStarOfAscension.NAME: Star of Ascension
DESCRIPTIONS: A star given to you by The Spire. It feels like it attracts evil.

AscMod:StarOfAscension.NAME: Star of Ascension
DESCRIPTIONS: A star given to you by The Spire. It has an ominous feel to it.
